definition: to attach or add, to be in direct contact with
details:
verb
- to attach or add
= example: to attach or add
- to be in direct physical contact with
= example: to be in direct physical contact with
= synonyms: contact
- to lie adjacent to another or share a boundary
= example: to lie adjacent to another or share a boundary
= synonyms: march
adjective
- to be in direct contact with
= example: to be in direct contact with
